content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the applicant incurred professional fees of €1788 which they are responsible for paying the court has made a final resolution in the matrimonial property case awarding the applicant certain movable properties and the defendant an electrolux washing machinedryer the defendant has also been ordered to compensate the applicant with €525 for a highervalue property the court has declared that the applicant is personally liable for credit obligations from a credit agreement the legal text discusses two articles in the civil code one about shareable property and the other about the rights of creditors the applicant has brought an action for the dissolution of the marriage seeking the retention of their name and establishment of their childrens names as well as maintenance for the children the court needs to decide on the division of property and obligations as well as the applicants obligation to a bank and payment of costs the court has granted the applicants request for the dissolution of the marriage ordered the division of property and payment of maintenance and also ordered the applicant to pay the defendants costs the applicant has been awarded certain movable assets with a total value of €1550 including a blue living room sofa the defendant is ordered to compensate the applicant with €525 the applicant is also personally liable for credit obligations the applicant is ordered to pay the defendant €1788 in costs and the state is ordered to pay additional fees
